last_episode_to_air.name: Episode #1.1
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tensions rise when Enoch, a polygamist with two wives and 17 kids, decides to bring bride #3 into the fold threatening to upset the delicate balance of peace and domestic bliss he and his current wives have worked so hard to make possible.

name: Three Wives, One Husband
overview: Documentary providing access to the community of Rockland Ranch in the middle of the Utah desert, where 14 Mormon families have made a home for themselves. Half the men here are polygamists, including father-of-16 Enoch Foster. He is one of the most influential men in the community and has two wives, who adore him and each other. But their family is set to expand again, with baby number 17 on the way - and Enoch is also courting a third wife, 25-year-old nanny Lydia.
